sourcesContent:
Seat Reservation System
+

Booking Status

Total Number of Seats: 80
No of Seats Avaiable
{{ num }} {{num}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-train-reservation', templateUrl: './train-reservation.component.html', styleUrls: ['./train-reservation.component.css'] }) export class TrainReservationComponent { seatnumbers: number[][]; availableseats : any; constructor(private http: HttpClient) { const range = Array.from({ length: 80 }, (_, i) => i + 1); this.seatnumbers = this.chunkArray(range, 7); } private chunkArray(arr: any[], chunkSize: number): any[][] { const chunks = []; for (let i = 0; i < arr.length; i += chunkSize) { chunks.push(arr.slice(i, i + chunkSize)); } console.log(chunks) return chunks; } ngOnInit() { this.http.get('http://localhost:3000/api/seats/get').subscribe(data => { this.availableseats=data console.log(this.availableseats) }); } formData = { name: '', seats: 0 }; reserveSeats(numSeats: number){ let reservedSeats = []; const seatLayout = this.chunkArray(this.availableseats, 7); // Loop through the rows of the seat layout for (let i = 0; i < seatLayout.length; i++) { let row = seatLayout[i]; // Check if the row has enough availableseats seats to accommodate the reservation let numavailableSeats = row.filter(seat => seat === 1).length; if (numavailableSeats >= numSeats) { // Reserve seats in the same row for (let j = 0; j < row.length && numSeats > 0; j++) { if (row[j] === 1) { reservedSeats.push(i * 7 + j + 1); row[j] = 0; // Mark the seat as reserved numSeats--; } } // If all seats are reserved, return the reserved seat number if (numSeats === 0) { return reservedSeats; } } } // If there are not enough availableseats seats in one row, reserve nearby seats for (let i = 0; i < seatLayout.length; i++) { let row = seatLayout[i]; for (let j = 0; j < row.length && numSeats > 0; j++) { if (row[j] === 1) { reservedSeats.push(i * 7 + j + 1); row[j] = 0; // Mark the seat as reserved numSeats--; } } // If all seats are reserved, return the reserved seat number if (numSeats === 0) { return reservedSeats; } } // If there are no availableseats seats left, return an empty array return reservedSeats } onSubmit() { if((this.formData.seats)>7){ this.formData.seats=7 } const seatnumbers=this.reserveSeats(this.formData.seats) console.log(seatnumbers) this.http.post('http://localhost:3000/api/seats/create', {"name":this.formData.name,"seats":this.formData.seats,"seatNumbers":seatnumbers}).subscribe(response => { alert(`Booked Seats : ${seatnumbers}`) window.location.reload(); }); } }
